name: Lyttonia
description:
Backstory

A great threat torments the land of Lyttonia. Once thought extinct, dragons have appeared out of the heart of Mount Lytton. Lyttonia is now at risk at being destroyed and the only way to prevent this crisis is to find the Golden Draconid Horn. An ancient horn crafted by Lyntonian ancestors, used to repel dragon attacks on the kingdom of Lyttonia. Finding this horn is the only way out of certain destruction.

The Player Character

You, the protagonist, is a Lyttonian knight sent by the Queen herself to investigate and find the Golden Draconid Horn in order to save the kingdom from a fierce dragon attack. The player will need to explore through the kingdom, interacting with anything possible in order to find the horn and save Lyttonia.
